title: Textile, early–mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: damask with supplementary weft
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 99 x 47 cm (39 in. x 18 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 100 x 47 cm (39 3/8 x 18 1/2 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Dark green damask brocaded in gold and pink in a Bizarre-style design of intertwined foliage and flowers.

early–mid-18th century. Medium: silk, metallic
